text: Dájúdájú A ó máa dan yín wò nínú dúkìá yín àti ẹ̀mí yín. Dájúdájú ẹ̀yin yóò máa gbọ́ ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ ìpalára láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn tí A fún ní tírà ṣíwájú yín àti àwọn ọ̀ṣẹbọ. Tí ẹ̀yin bá ṣe sùúrù, tí ẹ sì bẹ̀rù (Allāhu), dájúdájú ìyẹn wà nínú àwọn ìpinnu ọ̀rọ̀ t’ó pọn dandan
